title: What two champions would you fuse?
body:
If you could fuse two champions together and use all 8 of their abilities who would it be and why?
I would either go for {{champion:412}} and {{champion:238}} because hooks being sent from three shadows sounds way more efficient than one and the shadow to hook sounds much more spammable than a flash hook.
Or I would fuse {{champion:103}} and {{champion:37}} just in hopes they make a even cuter champion.

{{champion:29}} Twitch and {{champion:17}} Teemo

SUPER RANGE, SUPER POISON, SUPER INVISIBLE, SUPER MOBILE CREATURE OF HELL!

You would never be visible. When you were they would never catch you. You'd have double stacking poison and an ability that deals heavy damage via poison. You'd have the range of Twitch's ultimate. You'd have shrooms. You'd have over 100% bonus attack speed combining Teemo passive and Twitch Q.

Nobody would see you. Nobody would escape. The rift quivers in fear.
I like you.

Galio and Morgana for the wombo! The two compliment each other well
{{champion:3}} + {{champion:20}} works better

Disagree strongly. Both can be interrupted and there's no real synergy other than LOL TONS OF DAMAGE. You'd be better off pairing Galio with Fiddlesticks in that case, at least you'd get a gap closer off the ult. Galio's ult sets up Morgana's; by the time hers finishing channeling, the taunt has kept everyone in place long enough. Likewise, Morgana's shield sets up Galio's ult--he can't be interrupt from taunting if he has Black Shield. The kits intermesh far better than just stacking AOE ults.
